Author: tpc
linked_microtrends: A-Commerce,Body As Interface,Instant Written Customer Service
App_description: Virtual assistants can provide quick information to customers, employees or partners on the go. These assistants can be available to remote users through smartphones, smart speakers, or smart appliances. Presential users can access these assistants through kiosks. Chatbots can provide quick information to customers, employees or partners on the go. Can be made available through dedicated messaging APPs like WhatsAPP or embedded in existing channels like the on-line stores or APPs.

Author: aec
App_description:
Automatic ordering and checkout is the simplest embodiment of the A-commerce trend. The aim of this application is always to rid the customer journey of all friction at the checkout and ordering stages. Subconsciously, if companies already carry so much data on consumers, why should they ever have to ask for confirmation/details on an action they've performed tens, hundreds or even thousands of times.
I've bought the same toilet paper for 3 years in a row, can the multi-million euro retailer I shop at pick up on that?

Author: aec
App_description: Automated styling is the most organic practical hemisphere of automated commerce. This previously sci-fi reserved ambition, would in theory (not for long) curate a consumer's cart whenever they need an extra hand with choosing or simply aren't interested in spending time differentiating between two products. For some, shopping for a summer wardrobe is a ritual, for others a pain. Despite it all, with select products and services, a majority of people don't necessarily value time spent in choosing - think detergent, toilet paper, toothpaste. Wouldn't it be amazing to have the "just choose the cheapest one" or "get my anything whitening and minty".

Author: aec
App_description: While we can tackle the aging problem by leveraging complex engineering solutions, the human dimension remains. This sphere is often harder to approach due to its inherent abstractiveness and inertia for culture change. A well-oiled corporate environment in the future will necessarily nurture collaboration between senior and junior employees - optimizing knowledge transfer and better exploring the value of experience so commonly overlooked.

Author: nlg
App_description: Making part-time or freelance job opportunities available to retirees to overcome scarcity of labour and allow them an extra income stream and a renewed sense of purpose.

Author: tpc
App_description: Include in the assortment products that can be communicated as cruelty free. The sourcing of these product can be done by scouting producers that are already using cruelty free production approaches or by providing training to the producers of our club towards those approaches.

Author: man
App_description: While brands develop communication to be inspiring and convince customers that they are guided by the correct values, different awareness campaigns may be created and supported.

Author: tpc
App_description: Provide tools that deliver quick and relevant information for employees of customer care (call centres) to allow the written contact with several customers simultaneously.

Author: aec
App_description:
With robots and automation making more and more frequent appearances in our everyday lives, we, people, are confronted with the progressive decrease in human interaction. Despite this, at our core, we are social animals, and we like being with other people (whether we like it or not, ah!). A collateral consequence that arises is that people give authenticity and humanity higher value. Federico Marchetti said it beautifully when he predicted that "in the future there will be one label that will convey [a sense quality] to the customers - 'Made by Humans'".
Making the right choices when it comes to automation isn't always limited to efficiency and cost. Allowing the human touch to permeate your products and services where it matters most, can be a powerful loyalty driver, justifying and even contradicting RPAs or seamlessness.

Author: tpc
App_description: Develop and communicate a new range of products and services to help customers that want to stay more time offline to still get convenience, quality and attractive prices.

Author: man
App_description: With an increasing number of open borders and conflit fleeding populations, big cities incorporate the work of more and more nationalities. This forces cultures to cohabit in the same spaces, having influences in food and cultural options available.

Author: aec
App_description:
Interfacing is a hot topic nowadays. Depending on the industry, a platform's ease of use (or lack thereof) can overturn entire business ventures. It is unquestionable that we veer towards a future where human-machine interfaces are more organic, aiming to eradicate learning curves.
Currently, voice control is, with little doubt, the closest we have to achieving the fluidity necessary for this - we certainly must teach someone what "Ctrl+A" is, and does anything interesting, but shouting "Hey Siri, play me the Beatles" comes second to language (and some good taste...).

Author: aec
App_description: Another iteration in the new interface world, motion control is one that ambitions (arguably) the easiest learning processes. Motion for control is an obvious extension of our sensorial world. A trivial example is the simple but revolutionary "pinch-to-zoom" gesture popularised to omnipresence (and usually attributed to Apple's first iPhone).

Author: tpc
App_description: People use their unique biological traits to be identified, manage access to resources or authorize payments through voice, fingerprint or iris recognition. After the biometric identification employees, partners and customers access admission-controlled assets (e.g. offices, technical areas, or lockers) or classified information (e.g. interaction with customer care, or APPs) without using codes or cards.

Author: man
App_description: The awareness to the plastic residues problem is forcing some action into rethinking the end-of-life of products, namely their packages. A solution passes through refilling ou separating more thoroughly and sending back to producer in order to reuse packages.

Author: man
App_description: Since omnichannel is a given right to the customer in several funcionalities, it is expected that bulk foods also reach the online basket.

Author: man
App_description: Lives are changing, with easy access to different lifestyles people may not be dedicated to traditional activities anymore. This means that tasks like buying raw and cooking may be replaced for ordering in, having take-away food or eating out. By transforming supermarkets into food preparation locations we are creating an in-between of restaurants and home-cooking.

Author: aec
App_description:
While Flexible Workplaces is an unquestionable trending success, there is always going to be a core mass of work that gravitates around physical headquarters. There is a parallel trend turning corporate headquarters into small cities. Whether it is one of the FAANG giants or an group of smaller companies, workers rejoice when finding all amenities within walking distance from work.
Forgot your allergy meds? Take a break and visit the pharmacy. Sick of traffic? Get up early and use that time in the work gym instead. Need to restock groceries? Walk by the supermarket when you get off.

Author: jgp
App_description: The new technological revolution is drastically decreasing the average half-life of learned skills. Thus, it's of the utmost importance for companies and employees to adapt to the roulette of new scenarios by gathering as many tools as possible. Knowledge is quantic nowadays.

Author: nlg
App_description: Offering open enrollment courses through the web/mobile.

Author: nlg
App_description: Organizing courses and workshops to help customers make the best choices and the best use of the products/services they buy.

Author: jgp
App_description:
Addressing the need to belong is the oldest commercial trick in the book. People want to be a part of something and brands must be able to address that social requirement. The good news is that the digital transformation that we're living in is boosting the businesses' ability to do it.

The digital age is skyrocketing the (peer) pressure through the roof, which, for retailers, represents both an opportunity (the feeling of emergency and the fear of missing out are sales drivers) and a threat (people's increasing desire to disconnect and to subscribe to digital detox programs or lifestyles).

Author: jgp
App_description:
Brands are living inside its customers' pockets 24/7. The ability for retailers to create the feeling of emergency is, therefore, higher than it ever was. 

People want to belong and to feel unique and businesses have an unprecedented opportunity to take advantage of those (apparently) paradoxical needs.

Author: jgp
App_description: It's not just about flexible hours or hot desks anymore. Different employees have different needs and now more than ever, companies must be willing to listen and to accommodate as many requirements as possible.

Author: jgp
App_description: Nowadays, "half the world away" is at a distance of a WIFI password. The ability to access information and to communicate from anywhere, at anytime, is reshaping the office paradigm and the way teams collaborate. The generation of global citizens is now paving the way to the new wave of global coworkers.

Author: nlg
App_description: Offering spaces in store that invite and provide adequate conditions for customers to work and organize gatherings.

Author: nlg
App_description: Allowing employees to work partly or mainly from other places than office.

Author: nlg
App_description: Creating open air workspaces within company premises and/or allowing employees to work in open air spaces.

Author: man
App_description: In a world that cannot support the current consumption of protein sources, alternatives are being developed to deliver the same taste, structure or nutritional value of what it intents to replace.

Author: man
App_description: Newer generations understand that in order to have a future livable world, some changes in lifestyle have to be made, like reducing the consumption of meat to a more sustainable and healthy intake.

Author: aec
App_description: Coming partly as a response to consumers' loss of confidence in the corporate world, the glassbox model is the most honest and radical stance relative to transparency and accountability - the companies adopting this model tend to openly disclose company policy (e.g. hiring practices, salary) and veer towards open-source development. When faced with a complication that could turn into a scandal/outrage, these agents announce that fact along with efforts being made to correct the wrong, instead of trying to quietly resolve the matter before it is discovered.

Author: man
App_description: Provide tools that ease the collection and reading of traceability information of food and non-food products. Adopting solutions and establishing partnerships that enable a supply-chain-wide traceability will help any company raise consumer trust as well as improving internal accountability.

Author: man
App_description: Information by request is already a reality in a selection of fields. Food past and characteristics seem like a logical next step that may align with the crescendo of worries about the environment and a fairer world.

Author: man
App_description: Minimalism and healthy trends give result to clean labels. This is a method to turn packages clearer and enlight customers of everything that is inside a package, so that people know exactly what they are consuming.

Author: tpc
App_description: Living in a world of personalization means stop applying the one size fits all to everyone and that means accepting people in their differences in more serious environments.

Author: man
App_description: People are valuing what are called superfoods and non-empty calories since they start to make associations of benefic effects by the intake of certain foods. Therefore including superfoods and the right nutrient quantities in prepackaged foods as well as communicating so efficiently may add value for the customer.

Author: jgp
App_description: In these times of unprecedented scrutiny, brands are expected to clearly communicate the practical benefits of their products.

Author: man
linked_microtrends: Genderless / Gender Neutral,Welcome Tourism,Foreign Residents,Flexible Workplaces

Author: man
App_description: Design as been long associated with gender. Genderless design is interpreted as a design style that breaks stereotypes associated with gender-norms. This may be applied to food mainly in the low-carb/light and healthy categories, that are no longer just a female worry.

Author: man
App_description:
With specific tests being more affordable - like genetic tests - diet plans can be more informed and tackle different types of bodies and what works for them.
Some doctors are realizing that they should tackle more prevention, intead of just aliviating the symptoms of sickness. A movement is therefore created to force the entry of more informed nutritional decisions into their prescriptions, taking advantage of foods intead of drugs.

Author: aec
App_description: While many consumers are actively making the choice to reduce or avoid certain foods (think anything dairy, gluten, eggs, meat…), a significant lot would happily resume their intake if they could. This represents a great part of the appeal in pro+prebiotics, where you healthily repopulate the gut microbiome and feed it as well, to hopefully lead a non-eventful gut-routine and maybe even ease or eliminate some of your intolerances and sensitivities.

Author: tpc
App_description: Provide a range of products that ease the health monitoring. A range of services that take advantage of these health monitoring devices such as sleep advising.

Author: tpc
App_description:
Besides providing products with heathy features, communicate these features through the adequate channels. People are eager to learn more about health, so provide information for customers and employees about what is healthy (foods and behaviours) and promote discussions about pros and cons of controversy topics.

Create initiatives for customer and for employees that promote healthy habits such as sports events, or educative workshops about food, postures, or stress management.

Author: man
Linked_megatrends:
Experiences
Health And Wellness
Informed People
App_description: While the attention to health as increased, the role of food as an emotional tool has not changed. Therefore by creating alternative indulgences, more healthy, it is allowed a free-guilt consumption.

Author: man
App_description: While the attention to health as increased, the role of food as an emotional tool has not changed. Therefore by creating alternative indulgences, more healthy, it is allowed a free-guilt consumption.  Restaurants like gourmet burger houses and wholewheat pizzas are spreading.

Author: tpc
App_description:
It is now up to companies and institutions to invest in two complementary and necessary venues: transparency so that the person never feels they're being misled and privacy protection methods and structures.

Talk about FREQUENT ONLINE deliveries

App_name: Reward for each Consumer Journey Step
Author: jgp
App_description: Now that each individual is a continuous data generation machine, people expect a clear benefit for each step of their shopping experience. The ability to convert pain points into perks will be one of the main factors to earn people's preference.

Author: aec
App_description: Vlogging has undeniable power, akin to old-timey blogging and their respective influencer community. This is the more organic way of keeping up with friends, celebs or anyone you follow and for a good reason, it is more authentic, personal, human - often even done live for an interactive experience, in essence, a simultaneous conversation with thousands of fans/friends/followers.

Author: tpc
App_description: Not every entity has the magnitude of Facebook to withstand the loss of trust and finantial hit breach after breach.

Author: aec
App_description: One can simply look over to China for cases of this application, but it is easily explained by the shift in the role brick-and-mortar increasingly plays in society: it is no longer the convenient option (that part will be played by e-commerce), people expect to be wowed and to be assisted when going through the effort of going to a physical store. The physical world is needed for knowledgeable advice on a brand's product range and for consumers to get hands-on with what they are looking for in an inspiring setting.

App_name: As convenient as the most convenient
Author: jgp
App_description: People's expectations are spilling over from one industry to another and between different mediums. Consumers want their visits to the supermarket to be as convenient as their online shopping experiences and their clothing stores to look like a museum.

Author: tpc
App_description: The tech revolution is shaping the future of work into an unpredictable mix of machine-automated and machine-enhanced tasks.

Author: tpc
App_description: Promote the rotation of jobs mostly when the tasks are too physical demanding or do not promote intellectual development.

Author: tpc
App_description: Develop single dose products in all ranges in food, hygiene and home care. Packaging must be innovative to provide economic and environmental sustainability.

Author: man
App_description: The adoption of cards for payments instead of money has been settled as a rule already. With smartphones being an extension of their owners it makes only sense that payments get digital.

Author: aec
App_description:
Offering products/services perceived as sophisticated, exquisite or luxurious at an affordable price.
Despite the undeniable persistence and growth of traditional luxury ranges (Rolls Royce sedans, Louis Vuitton handbags or Chateau Petrus bordeaux), we witness today that consumers will seek and purchase luxury in sectors and brands customarily positioned for a completely different target.

Author: jgp
App_description: Adopt new models to access content. People are quitting classical media and moving towards platforms where they can choose the content they want when they want it.

Author: aec
App_description: The senior audience is a very underexplored audience, especially in fields usually developed with younger consumers in mind (think consumer electronics and online marketplaces). There is no shortage of services and tools to leverage access to your offer for a previously underestimated and underapreciated audience.

App_name: Every employee has a different story
Author: jgp
App_description: Every employee has a unique set of needs. Companies should adapt their perks program to address each one of them.

Author: nlg
App_description: Creating original marketing/storytelling/etc content and products through the use of computer algorithms.

Author: aec
App_description:
One of the most significant parts contributing to Privacy Protection as a whole, is the preventive avoidance of data leaks, attacks, phishing, fraud, etc... This is the first line of defense, and it should go without saying that consumers only rest assured when they trust this is taken care of. Besides, although it is hard to measure return on investment for prevention, it is certainly cheaper than the PR crises and loss of trust that happens when it fails. Every company today should stop and think if they are prioritizing encryption, VPS usage when relevant, collecting only needed data, and the myriad of other good practices that so many neglect in place of cost reduction or marketing stunts.

An equally important side to transparency is how a brand or company behaves in case of data compromise or any abnormal case of attack. For the most part, what is increasingly being adopted is full transparency, in spite of quiet diffusal. Addressing isues that were not planned for, publicly/semi-publicly, builds trust and meets a more understanding consumer base, as opposed to coming accross as deception and losing valuable client and industry loyalty.

Author: nlg
App_description: Protecting customers from unauthorized or involuntary access or use of their personal/proprietary data.

Author: man
App_description: Electrical vehicles have been promised as a solution for fighting global warming in mobility since they do not free toxic emissions and the energy can be clean if collected from renewabe sources. It makes only sense that the transport of goods follows the trend, since they account for a great percentage of transportation.

Author: man
App_description: Auto-sustainable houses have in it's conception the design to be as independent as possible and not rely on external sources. Everything is connected in a circular holistic path to reduce waste and increase yields. By applying this concept to stores, sustainability is assured and savings may occur.

Author: nlg
App_description: Offering products that embrace the inner ambiguities and contradictions of customers' needs and wants.

Author: jgp
App_description: The proliferation of the Gig Economy is no longer at our doors; it has entered the room completely. The current technological paradigm is allowing companies and job seekers to close the gap between labor supply and demand.

Author: jgp
App_description: One man's trash is another man's treasure. With the blossom of the Sharing Economy, people are increasingly looking for platforms to let them optimize the lifecycle of their products while getting a benefit from that.

Author: jgp
App_description: Making itself a part of a story is a powerful strategy for a brand to help its customers relating with its products or services.

Author: jgp
App_description: Impatiance is growing as consumers keep getting bombed by increasingly amounts of information. Brands have now the responsability to ease that pain by clearly communicating the value proposition of their products in a simple and balanced way.

Author: nlg
App_description: Adopting solutions and establishing partnerships that supervise the compliance of supply-chain practices with established standards.

Author: aec
App_description: Long time coming, but today stronger than ever, alternatives to plastic are highly sought after, seeing as we have not found a reliable method to guarantee correct plastic waste disposal (or its recycling). With harder legislative deadlines being pushed ever so quickly, it is no longer simply good for the planet, it is becoming an operational requirement.

Author: aec
App_description: Packaging (and in particular, grocery packaging) is being implemented in parallel to plastic alternatives and should become increasingly relevant with the progression of e-commerce over brick-and-mortar retail. The holy grail in this field is, of course, the grocery bag, which promises to revolutionise the industry as soon as a no-compromise solution comes.

Author: man
App_description: One of the strategies on the war on plastic is to rethink packages, either in size or material composition. Reducing size to only what is necessary and creating materials that are easier to recycle (usually opting in for monomaterials) are tools that should be adopted by both designers and suppliers.

Author: man
App_description: There is a lot of misinformation on sustainability and plastics, so educating customers may be the answer to save the world.

Author: man
App_description: Recycling has been around for at least a decade, however the outputs made with recyclated materials are still scarce. By educating people and improving the separation, recycling may increase it's value, giving birth to new products.

Author: nlg
App_description:
With open borders and the mix of cultures each time more present in a growing number of cities, a need for a comum language and translations arise.
Offering products and services that solve or mitigate nuisances and inconveniences of foreign visitors as well as giving them advantages/benefits  that help make the most of their visits and optimize their experience.

Author: man
App_description: From influencers that show how to live with zero waste to companies that commit to similar goals, garbage is no longer regarded as disposable but as something that is worthwhile taking a second appreciation.

Author: jgp
App_description: Being unique is the new fashion. Brands should create the conditions for consumers to feel special by customizing their products.

Author: jgp
App_description:
If it's worth a "like", it's worth a visit. The value proposition of a brand is not exclusively inherent to its products or services anymore. The surroundings count.
Design every product and service so that consumers want to take a picture of it and share it.
